GDG DevFest 2014

About GDG DevFest

Conference

The biggest Google related event in the country carefully crafted for you by GDG community! Awesome speakers and lot's of fun!

Workshops

Full-day of workshops, hands-on experience, hacking and debugging. Come and tame your favourite technology!

Hackathon

Full-day free-style hackaton! Want some real teambuilding on friday? Grab your team and join our hackathon!
